reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well and is comfortable, with one mentioning it's stretchy enough to accommodate a bump.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress, great for big chested women
items.body: Wore this in black to a wedding and got so many compliments. I was 12 weeks pregnant and this hugged my curves and stretched in all the right places. It came with a slight smell so I washed before wearing. I’m a 2-4 with a larger chest (34 G), an hourglass shaped body, and got a small, it fit perfectly. I had no excessive cleavage or slippage, it also didn’t ride up too much like a lot of tight fitting dresses do. The feel was much like comfortable tee-shirt, but the fabric was thick and good quality. Overall I’m pleased with the buy and might buy another color in the future Read more
items.author: Gabriela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great last minute find
items.body: Really flattering and heavier-ish material that isn’t see through at all. Really nice for the price! I’m sometimes a small, sometimes a medium, I got a medium so it isn’t skin tight and glad I did. Great find, not tight on your stomach and will make you look great, too! Read more
items.author: Jennifer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and flattering
items.body: I love this dress, comfortable, material was great. Very flattering. Only issue is had was I got a tear in it right where the zipper ends on the seam. It was at the end of the night. Not sure why. The dress was not too tight at all. I can sew it up. It was only about 2 inches but other then that it was great Read more
items.author: ginny

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Chic and elegant but slightly loose at the bust
items.body: I bought the Sarin Mathews Women's One Shoulder Long Formal Dress for a special event and was very happy with the overall look. The one-shoulder design is stylish and flattering, and the side slit adds a nice touch of elegance without going overboard. Fit: I ordered my usual size, and while the dress fits well in the waist and hips, the bust area was a little too loose. It didn’t quite sit snugly, so I had to adjust it a few times. A strapless or padded bra helped a bit, but it might require slight tailoring for a perfect fit. Quality: The material is soft, slightly stretchy, and feels comfortable against the skin. The dress drapes nicely and moves well when walking. Stitching was clean, and the zipper worked smoothly. Style: Perfect for formal events like weddings, banquets, or galas. I styled it with nude heels and a statement clutch—got lots of compliments! Final Thoughts: Great value and very elegant overall. If you’re in between sizes or smaller-busted, consider sizing down or planning for minor alterations. Read more
items.author: Alison Johnson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, Inexpensive Dress
items.body: I purchased this to wear to a last minute fundraiser gala and was NOT disappointed! It was extremely comfortable and very flattering! The slit is just high enough to be sexy but elegant and revealing. There is a thin elastic line that clings to your skin to hold it in place so even when I was dancing, I didn't have to tug or pull up on the strapless side. I second another review I saw that it did need to be ironed due to wrinkles in shipping, but it was very easy to iron. It was machine washable too! I purchased the deep green and it was a rich, beautiful emerald green. The fabric is thick so no peek-a-boo undergarments. I'm 5'7" and it hit right at my ankles so it may be a little long for shorter women. Read more
items.author: CarynC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS DRESS!
items.body: This dress is amazing! I received so many compliments in it. It does a great job of camouflaging the tummy area. It’s stretchy too so was perfect for a night of dancing at a wedding. It fit as expected. For reference I ordered a Medium and I’m 5’6 and weigh 140 pounds. Read more
items.author: Stephanie Gonzalez

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice Dress, someone else wore this one already
items.body: gorgeous dress, material is not as thick as I would have hoped, unfortunately, I was unable to wear it due to the fact that the dress has clearly been worn by someone else and smells of body odor and perfume. Just plain gross. Read more
items.author: bh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE LOVE LOVE
items.body: Love everything about this dress. Quality material, sturdy zipper, length and overall fit. Sizing chart is accurate. I’m 5’1 and 118 lbs and bought a size small. Being 5’1, length is always a concern for me. With 3” heels the length was perfect. Can’t wait to wear it again. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Formal Bodycon Split One Shoulder Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Formal Bodycon Split One Shoulder Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 04red, 07darkgreen, 03burgundy, 05royal Blue, 06navy, 02white, 01black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
